resources.string: The Meme-Feed app fetches memes from different subreddits through an API.

1. Scroll through the Home page to load more memes. "
"2. Press and hold on to a meme to open it in a dialog box. "
"3. You can zoom the image in the dialog box. "
"4. Tap on a meme's "Title" to open the source post on Reddit. "
"5. Tap on the share button to share a meme. "
"6. If you tap on a meme on the Home page, you will be directed to another page where you can swipe through memes of the same subreddit.
